oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snodgrass House, Chickamauga Park, near Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Snodgrass House at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. There are three cannons positioned outside of the house on left. Features a divided back, narrative, and handwritten correspondence on reverse. Postcard made in the United States of America. [R-29692]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Log cabins; Trees; Cannons
